import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser' import React, { useRef } from 'react' export default function ContactMe() { const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('YOUR_SERVICE_ID', 'YOUR_TEMPLATE_ID', form.current, 'YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); }; return (
